title: "What are the Four Sources of Suggestibility in Trading?"
first_phrase: In this text, we explore the four main causes of suggestibility that can affect a trader's decision making. These include authority, influence from others, crises/traumas/shocks and personal health. It emphasizes the importance of developing one's financial instincts and experiences to make independent decisions. The text provides tips on how to improve mental and physical health and avoid media influences. It also discusses the benefits of practicing creative self-hypnosis. By becoming aware of these causes, traders can avoid making wrong decisions and achieve significant gains by staying independent and emotionally stable.
